name: GCP Secret Manager Universal Orchestrator
description: This orchestrator extension manages certificates stored as secrets in Google Secret Manager.

store_types.Name: GCPScrtMgr

StorePassword.Description: Password used to encrypt the private key of ALL certificate secrets.  Please see [Certificate Encryption Details](#certificate-encryption-details) for more information

Properties.Name: PasswordSecretSuffix
Properties.Description: If storing a certificate with an encrypted private key, this is the suffix to add to the certificate (secret) alias name where the encrypted private key password will be stored.  Please see [Certificate Encryption Details](#certificate-encryption-details) for more information

Properties.Name: IncludeChain
Properties.Description: Determines whether to include the certificate chain when adding a certificate as a secret.

store_types.StorePathDescription: The Project ID of the Google Secret Manager being managed.
